title: Are BLACKPINK members actually close in real life? - Quora

response.answer_text: The girls are very close to each other in real life. For one they live together. They go out a lot, meet each other’s family (one time Rosé's mom thought she was talking to Rosé when it was Lisa on the phone who could totally pull off her aussie accent), sharing each other stuff (like Jennie always hands over her lip balm to Rosé, Lisa. They are so close to each other to that point where they are comfortable feeding each other (like literally feeding each other, but also just getting take out for each other), they are comfortable sharing beds, clothes (Lisa shares a sweatshirt with Rosé and Rosé's sister, Alice,), ect. Also Jisoo invited all of themto her older brother's wedding. They also once did some kind of question game while they were at Star Road (Jensoo and Chaelisa), where they had to answer questions about each other and all of them made a pretty good job on that. Here's the link: (skip forward to 33:55 min)  As you might already noticed Lisa and Rosé are the closest out of them, as well as Jennie and Jisoo. I personally think it's because both of them are foreigners and dealt a lot with being homesick, they are also nearly the same age (having an one month age gap) therefore a very similar taste and generally they appear very close to each other (Rosé was the first one to meet all of Lisa's 3 cats and even named her latest addition). That doesn’t really belongs to the proof that they’re close but I wanted to add this anyways, Lisa remembers the actual day she met Rosé (May 7th, 2012 at 5am in the elevator) and even what she was wearing. They both are also quite the disney fans as they regularly watch disney movies together to the point where both of them are able to sing along. They also watch K-Drama's together to improve their Korean. They also like going on little park dates (even had two vlives there) and since Rosé likes riding a bike along Han River, she actually bought Lisa one so that they can go together. Regarding Jensoo, they met each also during their trainee days and according to Jennie they went to a sauna together and checked out each other’s naked body while talking about their dreams, they later on became roommates. They also seem to go out a lot, doing stuff like "playing" basketball or making slime or play with their dogs. The reason why Rosé/Lisa and Jisoo/Jennie are closer is probably since they are sort of divided in "younger" ones and "older" ones. Nonetheless even though unnie-line/maknae-line are seemingly closer doesn’t mean Jisoo/Rosé, Jisoo/Lisa, Jennie/Rosé and Jennie/Lisa aren't also close. Jisoo helped both Rosé and especially Lisa with Korean. Jennie seems to have a little soft spot for Rosé as well as they call each other "Hubby&Wifey". As in for Jennie and Lisa, they often go to "events" together like the Dua Lipa concert last year (which got them a collab) or once Lisa and Jennie went to Thailand and had dinner with Lisa's and Jennie's parents. So this is my opinion: The members from BLACKPINK are close

Okay, now I may just be biased, by I don't think they are. Though they definitely aren't the funniest group out there, once somebody makes a joke/does something funny for once, nobody laughs or acknowledges it. They haven't really been through a lot as a whole (as fame was literally handed to them), and you see more Vlives of them being alone rather than together. At meet and greets, they don't really associate themselves together. The company they come from always have them work, though, so that may be another time where they can't mingle. If you saw on their trivia video (where the host asks questions about one member and the other 3 guess the answer), not very many questions were answered correctly, as if they didn't know each other like friends. Their relationship is kind of related like a coworker style-not too close but you know them/work with them. Also, there aren't very many funny fandom ships (I know there are only 4 members, but there can be 6 ships total. I've only heard 2. Red Velvet have WAY more popular ships than 2 though they are a 5 member group). If you are really into Kpop and are a major multi-fandom (like 15–30 groups are stanned by you and you know them well) and you made a list of funniest Kpop groups, BP most likely wouldn't be on it. Most Kpop humor comes from a connection between the members and how they act/enjoy their time together. Omg, I just realized how long this was. Well, this is my opinion… a very long one… Bye!

Obviously, they are very close in real life. First off, they are already a “family.” They lived with each other for a long time, and they seem to have a lot of fun. Personally, I think JenSoo and ChaeLisa are the closest. ChaeLisa: I personally think that they are close to each other, because they are both foreigners, they are the same age (1 month difference), and their personalities go well together. You probably think LiSoo’s personalities go best together, but to have someone who is calm, but funny (Rose) and someone who is serious, but a crackhead (Lisa) is a great combo in my opinion. JenSoo: JenSoo are the oldest ones in BLACKPINK. And they know Korea pretty well. JenSoo met each other during the trainee days, and they gelled very well together. And obviously, that is a sign to know that they are close, and care for each other. I think that the combo here is also good. Humorous but cool (Jennie), and 4D but tough (Jisoo). Jennie teaches Jisoo English the most (I think), and translates some things Jisoo doesn’t understand. ChaeNnie: A lot of people deny that ChaeNnie and LiSoo aren’t real, but they certainly are. Jennie always lets Rose borrows her things, and is rather soft with her because of the “Hubbey & Wifey” thing she has with Rose. Everyone says ChaeNnie are the least realistic ‘ship’ by far. But they are actually really good friends. They both speak fluent English also! LiSoo: LiSoo are one of those ships that a lot of people ship, but they just don’t look as real as some of the other ones. LiSoo are still great friends who love each other a lot. Jisoo taught both Lisa and Rose Korean, to help them learn it quicker. LiSoo are such a crackhead duo, and I think they like each other like that! It probably feels nice for Lisa/Jisoo to know that there is another crackhead in the group! It also probably feels nice for Rose/Jennie to know that there is another more shy member in the group! ChaeSoo: ChaeSoo are both very close, and they both take care of each other a lot. They are known to be very kind to each other, as their personalities are both VERY different. I don’t know much about ChaeSoo, but I know that they are close.For the How You Like That (24/365 with BLACKPINK EP. 2) bts (behind the scenes), Jisoo and Rose were in the same session for filming, and were cheering on each other. On 24/365 with BLACKPINK EP. 1, ChaeSoo were on a “date” and went out to make a pottery. JenLisa: JenLisa shippers, are definitely the most hard core out of all the BLACKPINK ships there are. *JenKai has left the chat*Anyway, JenLisa definitely is the most romantic on cam. As you can see them staring at each other in the camera. I don’t deny, they are amazing friends and they love each other. But I don’t think they are dating. Jennie secretly spoke English to Lisa, to make her feel welcomed.That’s an obvious sign of true friendship

Yes, of course Well for starters they live together and on average see each other everyday. They practice their songs/dances together, promote singles/albums together and film BP house and go on shows together. Spending that much time with someone you connect and have a bond. All of them are close to each other Chaeyoung and Lisa are best friends they’re always together in Vlives and Jennie and Jisoo are always together too and talk to each other on camera and off camera. Rosè and Jennie are really close too I think Jennie always lends Rosè her stuff especially lip balms. Jisoo helps Lisa with her Korean and also helps Rosè as well. Jennie also helps with ChaeLisa’s Korean as well. I feel like everyone ships ChaeLisa and JenSoo and think that these two pairs are the closest in real life. But there are so much Chaennie and LiSoo moments none realises too. They all interact with each other. Jennie, Rosè, Lisa & Jisoo have other idol friends but that doesn’t mean they aren’t close to each other because they are a lot. They got to know each other and met up a lot before the debut as well.

I'm sure they're all close to one another after being together for so long but Rosé and Lisa seem to have the strongest bond. They literally are inseparable and stick to each other like glue almost 99.9% of the time whether it's at concerts, airports, or out in public period and I don't think it's because it's a popular "ship". Their friendship is so cute!
Of course they are. They lived in the same dorm for many years. They have even said themselves: “We are not a group, we are a family”
Honey of course not they are not close
